help-file.title: "DARAGORS FLAMING SWORD"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: Self Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Protection
Uses the power of Daragor to infuse your wielded sword with the fury of flame and fire, causing extra damage in battle. If the reaver is also affected by fireshield, the inflicted fire damage is even bigger.
